law.catch_line: Subject to the approval of the Governor, the Mediation Service may:...

text.section:
Subject to the approval of the Governor, the Mediation Service may:
appoint a board of arbitration to settle a dispute; and
provide:
as the Mediation Service considers proper, for compensation of up to $5 for each day that a member of a board is engaged in its duties; and
for other necessary expenses of a board.
The Chief Mediator may serve on a board.
